channel.title: Descent: Underground
channel.description:
So I was looking at Dan Wentz's SoundCloud and noticed he put up some music for a new Descent game, lo and behold its a fully funded Kickstarter continuation of the Descent series!
[url]https://www.kickstarter.com/projects/descendentstudios/descent-underground[/url]
